first_translate: a few days later...
the duchy of halyeon
I can’t go around with his grace anymore...

hangle: 같이 이곳저곳 다니다 보면 꼭 시비가 걸리는데,
first_translate: every time we do, I get into trouble.
I thought this place was like a pigsty,
but I didn’t know people actually lived here.
that’s really mean-spirited.
still,
if abel wasn’t that way,
his family wouldn’t have survived until now.
well... you’re right.
chuckle
at least she acknowledges me for what I am!
good girl.
yikes!!
don’t be surprised.
since we decided on dating,

hangle: 앞으로 네가 떠먹여 주는 건 다 받아먹을 생각이거든.
first_translate: from now on, I’m going to take everything you give me.
n-no one said anything about giving--
your highness!
it looks like your tracking skills are quite impressive.
who is it?
the guy from last time.

hangle: 에레즈 후작이 내 궁에 밀어 넣은 인간.
first_translate: marquess ereze sent him to keep tabs on me.
cain ereze.
I’ve been looking everywhere for you!

hangle: 제발 제가 호위를 맡을 때마다 절 따돌리는 건 그만해주세요.
first_translate: please stop avoiding me every time I escort you.
oh.
is someone else there too?
my apologies.
fiona halyeon at your service.
no need for escorts.
now if you’ll excuse us.
then why...

hangle: 왜 제가 담당일 때만 필요가 없어지시는 겁니까?
first_translate: why don’t you ever want them when I’m assigned as your guard?
let’s leave then, lady fiona.
pr-prince sigren?

hangle: 따박따박한 걸 보니 시그렌과 쿵짝이 잘 맞을 수도 있을 것 같아.
first_translate: judging by how precise you were just now, maybe you’d suit sieg well.

hangle: 에레즈 가문 사람만 아니었다면 좋았을 텐데.
first_translate: too bad he’s part of house ereze though.
this isn’t some kind of “romeo and juliet” story.
you shouldn’t let something like their families’ relationship come between them.
stop thinking weird things again.
lady fiona.
his grace wants to see you.
pardon?
he says he’s returning to halyeon.
yes.
has something happened back home?
not exactly,
but jeron might kill himself soon.
or I swear I will seriously quit!!!

hangle: 서류를 처리하던 나와 아벨이 없으니 괴롭긴 하겠지…
first_translate: with both abel and myself gone, dealing with paperwork must be difficult for him...

hangle: 어차피 너무 오랫동안 영지를 비워두기도 했고,
first_translate: and besides, I haven’t visited our territory in so long anyway.
I guess it’s time I went back.
but once I return to halyeon,
there won’t only be one or two people targeting sieg and fiona.

hangle: 시그렌과 피오나를 노릴 인간이 한둘이 아닐 거다.
first_translate: over my dead body would I allow that bastard to become emperor while I still live.

hangle: 내가 살아 있는 동안 황태자 놈이 황제 되는 꼴은 못 보는데.
first_translate: over my dead body would I allow that bastard to become emperor while I still live.

hangle: 안 그래도 어둠이 나타나면서 마물의 공세가 거세졌는데,
first_translate: on top of that, since darkness has appeared, demonic attacks have intensified.

hangle: 멍청한 황태자가 황제가 되면 제대로 대책을 세울 것 같지도 않다.
first_translate: if that stupid crown prince becomes emperor, I doubt they’ll even prepare any countermeasures against these monsters.

hangle: 그러면 피해를 떠안는 건 최전선인 헤일론이다.
first_translate: in which case, halyeon will suffer greatly because it lies along the front lines.
additionally, he’ll probably oppress those living up north.

hangle: 이 이상 멍청한 놈 때문에 영지가 망하는 꼴을 두고 볼 생각은 없어.
first_translate: I refuse to stand idly by and watch my land fall apart due to such incompetence.
so why did you bring sieg all the way down south?
your grace?
I wonder whether it’ll be alright without you here.
me too.
I worry about you and sieg.
wait, you’re worried about us?
of course.
haaah...
seriously...
you two are adults now.
what does it matter if you end up together?
snicker
but fathers tend to fret over many things.

hangle: 나 없다고 둘이 쓸데없는 짓 하지 말거라.
first_translate: while I’m away, make sure not to do anything foolish.

hangle: 내 눈에 흙이 들어가기 전까지는 안 된다.
first_translate: never, unless it's over my dead body.

hangle: 조만간 진짜로 그놈의 흙, 뿌려버릴 거예요…
first_translate: one day, I may very well scatter dirt over your grave...
ooh.
it feels rather deserted out here. perhaps it’s because we took a shortcut.
since master left for halyeon already,

hangle: 그동안 아가씨 몸에 생채기라도 나면 저희가 죽겠군요.
first_translate: we’ll die if anything happens to you before he returns.

hangle: 설마 헤일론에서처럼 막무가내로 돌아다니실 건 아니겠죠?
first_translate: by no chance are you planning to run wild like you used to back in halyeon, correct?
when did I ever do that?

hangle: 제 기억으로는 2, 4 성벽의 용병과 병사들을 쥐 잡듯이 잡으셨는걸요?
first_translate: as far as I remember, you slaughtered soldiers and mercenaries alike within the second and fourth walls like rats.
oh,
that was merely establishing order.
back then, you were amazing, miss fiona.

hangle: 귀여운 여자애가 싱글싱글 웃으면서 커다란 남자들을 휘어잡는 모습이란!
first_translate: seeing a cute little woman smile brightly while controlling big men was truly a sight to behold!
really? I acted like that?
i-it’s not meant as criticism, miss.

hangle: 오히려 그 모습에 반한 놈들도 있으니까요.
first_translate: rather, several guys fell head-over-heels after seeing that side of you.
f-falling for her?
trust me, it’s true.
for example, one of my friends...
sir isaac?
somebody is approaching.
sh*t!

hangle: 아가씨, 절대 마차 밖으로 나오지 마세요!
first_translate: miss fiona, please stay inside the carriage!
they look suspicious!
we’re under attack!
